trans_title: 鲁道夫·卡地亚：一位电视先驱
introduction: This Late Show special is a tribute to a great pioneer of British television drama who died recently. Linda Myles examines his contribution to the small screen, including works such as "The Quatermass Experiment" and his drama based on George Orwell's novel "Nineteen Eighty-Four", shown tonight at 11.15pm.Followed by Video Nation Shortshttp://www.bfi.org.uk/films-tv-people/4ce2b7d8a622f
chinese_title: 鲁道夫·卡地亚：一位电视先驱
